short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly capture and organize notes within your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need a quick way to jot down ideas or reminders? Our Chrome extension lets you create and manage notes effortlessly.

Features:

Create Notes Quickly: Add new notes in a snap.
Edit Instantly: Double-click any note to make changes.
Archive What's Done: Keep your workspace organized by archiving completed notes.
Stored Locally: Your notes stay on your device, ensuring privacy and control.
Why Choose This Extension?

Simplicity. Our extension focuses on providing you with a clean and efficient way to capture and manage your thoughts.
